text: Jonathan Stewart Vickers, (October 29, 1926 - July 10, 2015), known professionally as Jon Vickers, was a Canadian heldentenor. In 1957 Vickers joined Londonâ€™s Royal Opera House, Covent Garden company. In 1960 he joined the Metropolitan Opera. He became world famous for a wide range of German, French and Italian roles. ==Other websites== * The Essential Jon Vickers. *Interview with Jon Vickers by Bruce Duffie (originally published 1981 in Wagner News, the newsletter of the Wagner Society of America) * Jon Vickers at IMDB Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Canadian singers Category:Musicians from Saskatchewan
